forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening deepens in Downtown San Francisco, a gentle blanket of clouds envelops the city, whispering of mild temperatures that promise a tranquil night. Expect a low around 57, with a light west-southwest breeze offering an invitation to wander beneath the muted glow of the streetlights. The cityscape, dusted in the twilight's soft colors, suggests an evening best enjoyed with a light jacket—perhaps a stylish wrap to fend off the chill that may cling to the air, especially in the nooks of alleyways where shadows play.

Tomorrow, the sun will graciously reclaim the sky, ushering in a day painted in shades of blue and gold, boasting a high near 66. The afternoon may see temperatures cooling slightly to about 64, tempered by a lively series of winds rustling through the trees, with gusts reaching up to 26 mph. As the morning unfolds into a bright, mostly sunny day, it will be wise to dress in layers, ready to peel away the warmth of an outer layer as the sun rises high. Whether you choose to stroll along the Embarcadero, visit a local café, or even take a contemplative walk in Golden Gate Park, the day promises a refreshing escape amidst the urban tapestry. Enjoy the embrace of San Francisco's charm, where each moment under the expansive sky brings its own subtle joy.
